page.title: 08COMBINED SPORTS CENTRES
page.content:
There is only one sports centre in Livingston, this is at Craigswood. The centre has 2 squash courts,3 pool tables, 1 games_hall and a conditioning room. A new developement is an all_weather 400m running track.
Inveralmond and Deans are both Community Schools. This means they are open to the public after and during school hours. Adults can take courses in almost any academnic subjects or join one of the many clubs which use the facilities. Some of the sports available are squash, badminton, 5_a_side, basketball, swimming and volleyball. There are also non_certificate classes such as aerobics, photography and woodwork. The schools also have extensive playing fields with football, rugby and hockey pitches.
